reviewText:
Uncle Rock is a Musical Icon in the Woodstock area. When you go to one of his live concerts, the smiling faces and energy flows as much from the parents in the audience as from the kids. This live album captures that positive, hopeful energy.
You'll end up playing it in your car for your kids AND for yourself.
Really, he is a wonderful person who puts his heart and soul into his music. He's on a mission to bring happiness to kids in  this world and it's working.
